alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 6:43AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Spreading Into Lake County... At 640 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery and traffic cameras showed an area of fog spreading across Lake County, primarily near and west of the Florida Turnpike. Through sunrise, the fog is expected to continue to spread north across Lake County and linger through 900 AM. Visibilities will drop below 1 mile in many areas. If you will be out driving on area roadways early this morning, prepare to encounter rapid reductions in visibility due to dense fog. When driving in fog, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of driving distance between your car and the one in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
